trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must serialize the class member as an encoded SOAP attribute.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>tem de serializar o membro de classe como um atributo SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapAttributeAttribute class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes, or deserializes, an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SoapAttributeAttribute pertence a uma família de atributos que controla a forma como o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa ou deserializes, um objeto como XML de SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: O XML resultante está em conformidade com a secção 5 do documento Consortium World Wide Web (www.w3.org), "Simple objeto acesso Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista completa dos atributos semelhantes, consulte [atributos que controlo codificadas SOAP serialização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Para serializar um objeto como uma mensagem SOAP codificado, deve construir a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>utilizar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>criado com o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>método de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Apply the SoapAttributeAttribute to a public field to specify that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes the field as an XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o SoapAttributeAttribute a um campo público para especificar que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa o campo como um atributo XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: You can specify an alternative name of the attribute by setting the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar um nome alternativo do atributo definindo a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.AttributeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> if the attribute must be given a specific XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A>se o atributo tem de ser especificado um tipo de dados do idioma (XSD) de definição de esquema XML específico.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the attribute belongs to a specific XML namespace, set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o atributo pertence a um espaço de nomes XML específico, defina o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) > [!NOTE] > You can use the word `SoapAttribute` in your code instead of the longer SoapAttributeAttribute.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) > [!NOTE] > pode utilizar a palavra `SoapAttribute` no seu código em vez do SoapAttributeAttribute mais.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> when you override the serialization of a class member.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>quando poderá substituir a serialização de um membro de classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, set its properties, and set the object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Criar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, definir as respetivas propriedades e o objeto o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"></xref> class using the specified value as the name of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute"> </xref> classe com o valor especificado como o nome do atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: O nome do atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the XML attribute generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do atributo XML gerado pelo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Use the AttributeName property to specify an XML attribute name when the default value cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade AttributeName para especificar um nome de atributo XML quando o valor predefinido não pode ser utilizado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the XML attribute name is invalid as a member identifier, use a valid name for the identifier while setting the AttributeName to an invalid name.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o nome do atributo XML é inválido como um identificador de membro, utilize um nome válido para o identificador ao definir o AttributeName como um nome inválido.

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: O nome do atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: The default is the member identifier.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o identificador de membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type of the SOAP attribute generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de dados do esquema XML definição (XSD) de idioma do atributo SOAP gerado pelo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their.NET equivalents.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os tipos de dados simples de esquema XML com their.NET equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of <xref:System.Byte> structures, and apply a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> with the DataType set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Para o esquema XML `base64Binary` e `hexBinary` tipos de dados, utilize uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>estruturas e aplicar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>com o tipo de dados definido como "base64Binary" ou "hexBinary", como é adequado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the <xref:System.DateTime> type and apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> with the DataType set to "date" or "time".
trans-unit.target: Para o esquema XML `time` e `date` tipos de dados, utilize o <xref:System.DateTime>Escreva e aplicar a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>com o tipo de dados definido como "data" ou "tempo".</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For every XML Schema data type that is mapped to a string, apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> with its DataType property set to the XML Schema data type.
trans-unit.target: Para cada tipo de dados de esquema XML que está mapeado para uma cadeia, aplique o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>com a propriedade de tipo de dados definida para o tipo de dados de esquema XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Note that this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que isto não se altera o formato de serialização, apenas o esquema para o membro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A propriedade é maiúsculas e minúsculas, pelo que deve defini-lo exatamente a um dos tipos de dados de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient then passing it as an XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Transmitir dados binários como um elemento XML é mais eficiente passou-a como um atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML Schema data types, see the World Wide Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os tipos de dados de esquema XML, consulte o documento de World Wide Consortium (www.w3.org) com o nome "XML esquema parte 2: tipos de dados".

trans-unit.source: |XSD data type|.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURI|<xref:System.String>| |base64Binary|Array of <xref:System.Byte> objects| |boolean|<xref:System.Boolean>| |byte|<xref:System.SByte>| |date|<xref:System.DateTime>| |dateTime|<xref:System.DateTime>| |decimal|<xref:System.Decimal>| |double|<xref:System.Double>| |ENTITY|<xref:System.String>| |ENTITIES|<xref:System.String>| |float|<xref:System.Single>| |gDay|<xref:System.String>| |gMonth|<xref:System.String>| |gMonthDay|<xref:System.String>| |gYear|<xref:System.String>| |gYearMonth|<xref:System.String>| |hexBinary|Array of <xref:System.Byte> objects| |ID|<xref:System.String>| |IDREF|<xref:System.String>| |IDREFS|<xref:System.String>| |int|<xref:System.Int32>| |integer|<xref:System.String>| |language|<xref:System.String>| |long|<xref:System.Int64>| |Name|<xref:System.String>| |NCName|<xref:System.String>| |negativeInteger|<xref:System.String>| |NMTOKEN|<xref:System.String>| |NMTOKENS|<xref:System.String>| |normalizedString|<xref:System.String>| |nonNegativeInteger|<xref:System.String>| |nonPositiveInteger|<xref:System.String>| |NOTATION|<xref:System.String>| |positiveInteger|<xref:System.String>| |QName|<xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>| |duration|<xref:System.String>| |string|<xref:System.String>| |short|<xref:System.Int16>| |time|<xref:System.DateTime>| |token|<xref:System.String>| |unsignedByte|<xref:System.Byte>| |unsignedInt|<xref:System.UInt32>| |unsignedLong|<xref:System.UInt64>| |unsignedShort|<xref:System.UInt16>|
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de dados XSD |. <xref:System.SByte>| | data | <xref:System.DateTime>| | dateTime | <xref:System.DateTime>| | decimal | <xref:System.Decimal>| | duplo | <xref:System.Double>| | ENTIDADE | <xref:System.String>| | ENTIDADES | <xref:System.String>| | float | <xref:System.Single>| | gDay | <xref:System.String>| | gMonth | <xref:System.String>| | gMonthDay | <xref:System.String>| | gYear | <xref:System.String>| | gYearMonth | <xref:System.String>| | hexBinary | Matriz de objetos de <xref:System.Byte>| | ID | <xref:System.String>| | IDREF | <xref:System.String>| | IDREFS | <xref:System.String>| | int | <xref:System.Int32>| | número inteiro | <xref:System.String>| | idioma | <xref:System.String>| | longo | <xref:System.Int64>| | Nome | <xref:System.String>| | NCName | <xref:System.String>| | negativeInteger | <xref:System.String>| | NMTOKEN | <xref:System.String>| | NMTOKENS | <xref:System.String>| | normalizedString | <xref:System.String>| | nonNegativeInteger | <xref:System.String>| | nonPositiveInteger | <xref:System.String>| | NOTATION | <xref:System.String>| | positiveInteger | <xref:System.String>| | QName | <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>| | duração | <xref:System.String>| | cadeia | <xref:System.String>| | curto | <xref:System.Int16>| | tempo | <xref:System.DateTime>| | token | <xref:System.String>| | unsignedByte | <xref:System.Byte>| | unsignedInt | <xref:System.UInt32>| | unsignedLong | <xref:System.UInt64>| | unsignedShort | <xref:System.UInt16>|</xref:System.UInt16></xref:System.UInt64></xref:System.UInt32></xref:System.Byte></xref:System.String></xref:System.DateTime></xref:System.Int16></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Int64></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Int32></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Byte></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Single></xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Double></xref:System.Decimal></xref:System.DateTime></xref:System.DateTime></xref:System.SByte></xref:System.Boolean></xref:System.Byte></xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".
trans-unit.target: Um tipo de dados de esquema XML, conforme definido pelo documento Consortium World Wide Web (www.w3.org) com o nome "XML esquema parte 2: tipos de dados".

trans-unit.source: The XML Schema data type you have specified cannot be mapped to the .NET data type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de dados de esquema XML que especificou não pode ser mapeado para o tipo de dados do .NET.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaço de nomes XML do atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A> property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification "Namespaces in XML".
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A>propriedade está em conformidade com a especificação de Consortium World Wide Web (www.w3.org) "Espaços de nomes no XML".</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create namespaces that are associated with prefixes, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces> that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Para criar espaços de nomes que estão associados com prefixos, terá de criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>que contém os espaços de nomes e prefixos utilizados no documento XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>

trans-unit.source: The namespace you set for each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> must match one of the namespaces in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes definidos para cada <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>deve coincidir com um dos espaços de nomes no <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates the XML code, it correctly prefixes each attribute name.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>gera o código XML, prefixos corretamente cada nome de atributo.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: Espaço de nomes XML do atributo XML.
